ResearchProjectDef.label: [A2B] Teleporters
ResearchProjectDef.description: An advanced component using molecular disintegration, wireless data transmission and subsequent reintegration to move items.\n\nThese components are very power hungry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [A2B] Teleporter Efficiency
ResearchProjectDef.description: Highly efficient microprocessors and circuitry reduces the power requirements when teleporting items. This should stop complaints about rolling black-outs!

ResearchProjectDef.label: [A2B] Teleporter Coolant
ResearchProjectDef.description: An improved teleporter design using liquid nitrogen coolant reduces the heat generated when teleporting items. No more flash fires!

ResearchProjectDef.label: [A2B] Teleporter Channels
ResearchProjectDef.description: Increased network bands allows for more network channels to teleport on.

ResearchProjectDef.label: [A2B] Teleporter Speed
ResearchProjectDef.description: Increased network bandwidth allows for more more data to be pushed at once translating into faster teleportation.
